summary: Provides a Django test suite that verifies the correct retrieval, caching, and query optimization of related model instances, covering forward and reverse foreign‑key and one‑to‑one relationships as well as combined querysets using logical operators.
business_intent: Guarantee that related objects are fetched efficiently and accurately, confirming that caching mechanisms and ORM optimizations (select_related, prefetch_related) work as intended to improve application performance.
